mapper.select: SELECT FACTORYID, (select MATERIALNAME from DSP_MATERIAL WHERE FACTORYID = #{factoryid} AND ISUSABLE = 'Y') as MATERIALNAME, FORMAT(NOTICE_DATETIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') as NOTICETIME, EA1, EA2, VALUE from DSP_ANOMALYDETECT_NOTICE WHERE FACTORYID =#{factoryid} AND ISUSABLE ='Usable' AND CREATETIME BETWEEN #{start} AND DATEADD(DAY, 1, #{end}) AND NOTICE_REASON='UNDER-PRODUCTION';
